Classes/AlertFactory.html#/s:17StanwoodA.name: makeAlert(viewController:message:buttonTitle:)
Classes/AlertFactory.html#/s:17StanwoodA.abstract: Returns an AlertViewController with an OK button and displays a message on the view controller.

Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.name: init(context:key:)
Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.abstract: Init function. Pass in the application context as it is a required parameter. The key is optional.

Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.name: setDebug(enabled:)
Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.abstract: Enable the debug mode for the framework if aplicable. Returns the builder so that it can be chained.

Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.name: setLogging(enabled:)
Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.abstract: Enable the logging feature if the framework supports it. Returns the builder so that it can be chained.

Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.name: setExceptionTracking(enabled:)
Classes/Tracker/Builder.html#/s:17Stanwo.abstract: Enable the exception tracking feature if the framework supports it. Returns the builder so that it can be chained.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.name: start()
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.abstract: Start method for the analytics framework. It is called if tracking is enabled (which is the default). This method must be overridden in a Tracker subclass.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.name: track(trackingParameters:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.abstract: Track data using tracking parameters. Called by StanwoodAnalytics class. This method must be overridden in a Tracker subclass.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.name: track(trackerKeys:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.abstract: Track using custom keys. Called by StanwoodAnalytics class. This method must be overridden in a Tracker subclass.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.name: track(error:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.abstract: Track an NSError. Called by StanwoodAnalytics class. This method must be overridden in a Tracker subclass.

Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.name: setTracking(enabled:)
Classes/Tracker.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalyt.abstract: Enable or disable tracking. Called by StanwoodAnalytics class. This method must be overridden in a Tracker subclass.

Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.name: init(eventName:)
Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.abstract: Init with event name only. The remaining parameters are all set to nil.

Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.name: init(eventName:itemId:name:description:category:contentType:)
Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.abstract: Init with all the parameters. Event name is required, the remaining parameters are optionals.

Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.name: init(eventName:contentType:)
Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.abstract: Init with event name and content type only. The remaining parameters are all set to nil.

Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.name: init(eventName:name:)
Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.abstract: Init with event name and name only. The remaining parameters are all set to nil.

Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.name: debugInfo()
Structs/TrackingParameters.html#/s:17Sta.abstract: The info displayed for the local notification when debugging tracking.

Classes/StanwoodAnalytics/Builder.html#/.name: setNotificationDelegate(delegate:)
Classes/StanwoodAnalytics/Builder.html#/.abstract: Set a delegate to display local notifications. This is used for debugging the tracking. It will display a local notification for each time track is called.

Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.name: track(trackingParameters:)
Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.abstract: Track the parameters. Which parameters that are actually tracked depends on

Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.name: trackingEnabled()
Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.abstract: Returns the stored value for the tracking setting.

Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.name: setTracking(enabled:on:)
Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.abstract: Set this value to false to stop the tracking, and on the next start it will be fully disabled.

Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.name: trackScreen(name:className:)
Classes/StanwoodAnalytics.html#/s:17Stan.abstract: Helper function to track the screen name along with the class name.

Structs/TrackingParameters.html.name: TrackingParameters
Structs/TrackingParameters.html.abstract: A struct to hold all the values to be sent to the trackers.

Classes/Tracker.html.name: Tracker
Classes/Tracker.html.abstract: The base class that must be subclassed for each analytics or logging frameworks

Classes/DataStore.html.name: DataStore
Classes/DataStore.html.abstract: Wrapper class for saving tracking flag to UserDefaults

Classes/AlertFactory.html.name: AlertFactory
Classes/AlertFactory.html.abstract: A Factory class that returns an AlertController

Core.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalytics15Parame.name: ParameterMapper
Core.html#/s:17StanwoodAnalytics15Parame.abstract: Protocol to map tracking parameters to a dictionary of [String:NSString] and removes all optionals.
